module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *13.0.46* FREEPBX-10998 FREEPBX-12036 FREEPBX-11479 FREEPBX-12218 *13.0.45* FREEPBX-11617 UCP Quick Link(s) to Return Calls to Voicemail *13.0.44* FREEPBX-11597 set voicemail to yes *13.0.43* FREEPBX-12168 Support voicemailRefresh when changing mailboxes *13.0.42* Revert the work done in 41, bring back dynamic hints *13.0.41* FREEPBX-11223 for res_mwi_blf dont use dynamic hints *13.0.40* FREEPBX-11928 VMX locator settings do not stick *13.0.39* Make sure VmX locator is actually loaded *13.0.38* FREEPBX-11223 Another attempt. If there is nothing in the DB then just assume default *13.0.37* FREEPBX-11103 FREEPBX-11223 *13.0.36* FREEPBX-10571 remove repeat add restart button to player *13.0.35* Simplify settings *13.0.33* FREEPBX-11425 correct ucp sorting problems *13.0.32* FREEPBX-11466 Add media class method to try and determine asterisk mimetypes *13.0.31* FREEPBX-10680 and FREEPBX-10961 *13.0.30* Support global file name functions *13.0.29* FREEPBX-11080 look for 40 character hashes *13.0.28* FREEPBX-10989 *13.0.27* FREEPBX-6164 *13.0.26* Make sure UCP is installed first *13.0.25* FREEPBX-10797 revert handling of temporary greetings *13.0.24* FREEPBX-10577 FREEPBX-10593 FREEPBX-10668 *13.0.23* FREEPBX-10572 VmX is always an option in UCP *13.0.22* Speed up voicemail parser by caching *13.0.21* Use boostrap tables and new HTML5 player *13.0.20* FREEPBX-9384 Extensions in UCP need to be strings not integers *13.0.19* Use proper reload when in UCP *13.0.18* FREEPBX-9855 remove features that are no longer in voicemail *13.0.17* FREEPBX-8275 Send email when forwarding if setup *13.0.16* Fix permission management in User Manager *13.0.15* FREEPBX-10209 Force charset UTF-8 in voicemail.conf *13.0.14* FREEPBX-10223 Fix form sumbition *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.12* Invalid array fix *13.0.11* FREEPBX-10129 Deleting extension does not delete voicemail user *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10100 fix help text, FREEPBX-10096 fix extra includes, FREEPBX-10126 VMX *13.0.9.1* Minor layout tweaks *13.0.9* Use proper astman checks *13.0.8* Use internal parsing engine *13.0.7* Try to catch more errors *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9726 ignore comment warnings *13.0.5* Dont write to files if the array is empty *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9685 dont require an email address unless attachment is set to yes, FREEPBX-9686 dont throw exception when vmailbox exists *13.0.3* Invalid loop errors *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha14* Better quick create visuals *13.0.1alpha13* Add hooks for bulk handler *13.0.1alpha12* Invalid Foreach fixes *13.0.1alpha11* Groups in usermanager *13.0.1alpha10* FREEPBX-8982 click to call/copy for voicemail in UCP *13.0.1alpha9* FREEPBX-8946 Add attach and delete options to user settings *13.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-8927 Badge count equal to 1 when no voicemail *13.0.1alpha7* saycid not playcid *13.0.1alpha6* Migrate vm_general.inc to voicemail.conf *13.0.1alpha5* Dont pound the actual file *13.0.1alpha4* Dont fatal during mailbox add *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-8130 Move emailbody back into voicemail.conf so that it shows up in Voicemail Admin *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-8555 Support passwordless voicemail retrieval in device/user mode *13.0.1alpha1* Layout changes
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
